thread.title: Steve Wynn Fallout Ripples as Republicans Seek Distance

author: Kristina Peterson
title: Steve Wynn Fallout Ripples as Republicans Seek Distance
text:
Republicans on Sunday worked to distance themselves from Steve Wynn in the wake of a Wall Street Journal report of former employees describing a decadeslong pattern of sexual misconduct by the casino mogul and GOP financial bigwig.
The allegations against one of Las Vegasâ€™s most powerful figures reverberated in the political world over the weekend, as Mr. Wynn stepped down from his post as Republican National Committee finance chairman. He had donated hundreds of thousands of dollars to GOP candidates and political committees,...
